evidence.claim: Joerns Healthcare utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company supports interoperability standards such as FHIR and HL7.
Joerns Healthcare's services adhere to HIPAA regulations ensuring data protection.
Joerns integrates with EHR systems via APIs and EDI protocols.

icp.icp_reason: Company utilizes HIPAA X12 for transactions, aligning with API-first healthcare data exchange needs.
